verses.verse: Concerning Moab. <S%H4124><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Woe <S%H1945><s%> to Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> for it has been destroyed; <S%H7703><s%> Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%> has been <S%H954><s%> put <S%H954><s%> to shame, <S%H954><s%> it has been captured; <S%H3920><s%> The lofty <S%H4869><s%> stronghold <S%H4869><s%> has been <S%H954><s%> put <S%H954><s%> to shame <S%H954><s%> and shattered. <S%H2865><s%>

"There <S%H369><s%> is praise <S%H8416><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%> no <S%H369><s%> longer; <S%H5750><s%> In Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> they have devised <S%H2803><s%> calamity <S%H9567><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her: 'Come <S%H1980><s%> and let us cut <S%H3772><s%> her off <S%H3772><s%> from [being] a nation! <S%H1471><s%>' You too, <S%H1571><s%> Madmen, <S%H4086><s%> will be silenced; <S%H1826><s%> The sword <S%H2719><s%> will follow <S%H310><s%> <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you.
"The sound <S%H6963><s%> of an outcry <S%H6818><s%> from Horonaim, <S%H2773><s%> 'Devastation <S%H7701><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> destruction! <S%H7667><s%>'
"Moab <S%H4124><s%> is broken, <S%H7665><s%> Her little <S%H6810><s%> ones <S%H6810><s%> have sounded <S%H8085><s%> out a cry <S%H2201><s%> [of distress.]

"For by the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Luhith <S%H3872><s%> They will ascend <S%H5927><s%> with continual <S%H1065><s%> weeping; <S%H1065><s%> For at the descent <S%H4174><s%> of Horonaim <S%H2773><s%> They have heard <S%H8085><s%> the anguished <S%H9496><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%> of destruction. <S%H7667><s%>
"Flee, <S%H5127><s%> save <S%H4422><s%> your lives, <S%H5315><s%> That you may be like a juniper <S%H6176><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

"For because <S%H3282><s%> of your trust <S%H982><s%> in your own achievements <S%H4639><s%> and treasures, <S%H214><s%> Even <S%H1571><s%> you yourself <S%H9040><s%> will be captured; <S%H3920><s%> And Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> will go <S%H3318><s%> off <S%H3318><s%> into exile <S%H1473><s%> Together <S%H9191><s%> with his priests <S%H3548><s%> and his princes. <S%H8269><s%>

"And a destroyer <S%H7703><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> So that no <S%H3808><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> will escape; <S%H4422><s%> The valley <S%H6010><s%> also will be ruined, And the plateau <S%H6><s%> will be destroyed, <S%H4334><s%> As the Lord <S%H8045><s%> has said. <S%H3068><s%>

"Give <S%H5414><s%> wings <S%H9481><s%> to Moab, <S%H4124><s%> For she will flee <S%H3318><s%> away; <S%H3318><s%> And her cities <S%H5892><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> a desolation, <S%H8047><s%> Without <S%H369><s%> inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> in them.

"Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the one who does <S%H6213><s%> the Lord's work <S%H4399><s%> negligently, <S%H9559><s%> And cursed <S%H779><s%> be the one who restrains <S%H4513><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> from blood. <S%H1818><s%>

"Moab <S%H4124><s%> has been <S%H7599><s%> at ease <S%H7599><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> his youth; <S%H5271><s%> He has also been <S%H8252><s%> undisturbed <S%H8252><s%> on his lees, <S%H8105><s%> Neither <S%H3808><s%> has he been emptied <S%H9553><s%> from vessel <S%H3627><s%> to vessel, <S%H3627><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> has he gone <S%H1980><s%> into exile. <S%H1473><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> he retains <S%H5975><s%> his flavor, <S%H2940><s%> And his aroma <S%H7381><s%> has not changed. <S%H4171><s%>

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> are coming, <S%H935><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "when I shall send <S%H7971><s%> to him those who tip <S%H6808><s%> [vessels, <S%H3627><s%>] and they will tip <S%H6808><s%> him over, <S%H6808><s%> and they will empty <S%H9553><s%> his vessels and shatter <S%H5310><s%> his jars. <S%H9311><s%>

"And Moab <S%H4124><s%> will be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of Chemosh, <S%H3645><s%> as the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was ashamed <S%H954><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> their confidence. <S%H4009><s%>
"How <S%H349><s%> can you say, <S%H559><s%> 'We are mighty <S%H1368><s%> warriors, <S%H1368><s%> And men <S%H376><s%> valiant <S%H2428><s%> for battle <S%H4421><s%>'?

"Moab <S%H4124><s%> has been destroyed, <S%H7703><s%> and men have gone <S%H5927><s%> up to his cities; <S%H5892><s%> His choicest <S%H4005><s%> young <S%H970><s%> men <S%H970><s%> have also gone <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the slaughter, <S%H2874><s%>" Declares <S%H5002><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>
"The disaster <S%H343><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> will soon <S%H7138><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> And his calamity <S%H9567><s%> has swiftly <S%H3966><s%> hastened. <S%H4116><s%>

"Mourn <S%H5110><s%> for him, all <S%H3605><s%> you who [live] around <S%H5439><s%> him, Even all <S%H3605><s%> of you who know <S%H3045><s%> his name; <S%H8034><s%> Say, <S%H559><s%> 'How <S%H351><s%> has the mighty <S%H5797><s%> scepter <S%H4294><s%> been broken, <S%H7665><s%> A staff <S%H4731><s%> of splendor! <S%H8597><s%>'

"Come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from your glory <S%H9202><s%> And sit <S%H3427><s%> on the parched <S%H6772><s%> ground, <S%H6772><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> dwelling <S%H3427><s%> in Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> For the destroyer <S%H7703><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> has come <S%H5927><s%> up against you, He has ruined <S%H7843><s%> your strongholds. <S%H4013><s%>

"Stand <S%H5975><s%> by the road <S%H1870><s%> and keep <S%H6822><s%> watch, <S%H6822><s%> O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Aroer; <S%H6177><s%> Ask <S%H7592><s%> him who flees <S%H5127><s%> and her who escapes <S%H4422><s%> [And] say, <S%H559><s%> 'What <S%H4100><s%> has happened <S%H1961><s%>?'

"Moab <S%H4124><s%> has been <S%H954><s%> put <S%H954><s%> to shame, <S%H954><s%> for it has been <S%H2865><s%> shattered. <S%H2865><s%> Wail <S%H3213><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%> out; Declare <S%H5046><s%> by the Arnon <S%H769><s%> That Moab <S%H4124><s%> has been destroyed. <S%H7703><s%>
"Judgment <S%H4941><s%> has also come <S%H935><s%> upon the plain, <S%H4334><s%> upon Holon, <S%H2473><s%> Jahzah, <S%H3096><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Mephaath, <S%H4158><s%>
against <S%H5921><s%> Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> and Beth-diblathaim,
against <S%H5921><s%> Kiriathaim, <S%H7156><s%> Beth-gamul, and Beth-meon,

against <S%H5921><s%> Kerioth, <S%H7152><s%> Bozrah, <S%H1224><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> and near. <S%H7138><s%>
"The horn <S%H7161><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> has been cut <S%H1438><s%> off, <S%H1438><s%> and his arm <S%H2220><s%> broken, <S%H7665><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Make <S%H7937><s%> him drunk, <S%H7937><s%> for he has become <S%H1431><s%> arrogant <S%H1431><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> so Moab <S%H4124><s%> will wallow <S%H5606><s%> in his vomit, <S%H9514><s%> and he also <S%H1571><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> a laughingstock. <S%H7814><s%>

"Now was not Israel <S%H3478><s%> a laughingstock <S%H7814><s%> to you? Or <S%H518><s%> was he caught <S%H4672><s%> among thieves <S%H1590><s%>? For each <S%H1767><s%> time <S%H1767><s%> you speak <S%H1697><s%> about him you shake <S%H5110><s%> [your head in scorn.]

"Leave <S%H5800><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> and dwell <S%H7931><s%> among the crags, <S%H5553><s%> O inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> And be like a dove <S%H3123><s%> that nests <S%H7077><s%> Beyond <S%H5676><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the chasm. <S%H6354><s%>

"We have heard <S%H8085><s%> of the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> – he [is] very <S%H3966><s%> proud <S%H1343><s%> – Of his haughtiness, <S%H7312><s%> his pride, <S%H1347><s%> his arrogance <S%H1346><s%> and his self-exaltation.

"I know <S%H3045><s%> his fury, <S%H5678><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "But it is futile <S%H3808><s%>; <S%H9210><s%> His idle <S%H907><s%> boasts <S%H907><s%> have accomplished <S%H6213><s%> nothing. <S%H3808><s%>

"Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I shall wail <S%H3213><s%> for Moab, <S%H4124><s%> Even for all <S%H3605><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall I cry <S%H2199><s%> out; I will moan <S%H1897><s%> for the men <S%H376><s%> of Kir-heres.

"More <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the weeping <S%H1065><s%> for Jazer <S%H3270><s%> I shall weep <S%H1058><s%> for you, O vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sibmah! <S%H7643><s%> Your tendrils <S%H5189><s%> stretched <S%H5674><s%> across <S%H5674><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> They reached <S%H5060><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Jazer; <S%H3270><s%> Upon your summer <S%H7019><s%> fruits <S%H7019><s%> and your grape <S%H1210><s%> harvest <S%H1210><s%> The destroyer <S%H7703><s%> has fallen. <S%H5307><s%>

"So gladness <S%H8057><s%> and joy <S%H1524><s%> are taken <S%H622><s%> away <S%H622><s%> From the fruitful <S%H3759><s%> field, <S%H3759><s%> even from the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%> And I have made the wine <S%H3196><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> from the wine <S%H3342><s%> presses; <S%H3342><s%> No <S%H3808><s%> one will tread <S%H1869><s%> [them] with shouting, <S%H1959><s%> The shouting <S%H1959><s%> will not be shouts <S%H1959><s%> [of joy.]

"From the outcry <S%H2201><s%> at Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> even to Elealeh, <S%H500><s%> even to Jahaz <S%H3096><s%> they have raised <S%H5414><s%> their voice, <S%H6963><s%> from Zoar <S%H6820><s%> even to Horonaim <S%H2773><s%> [and to] Eglath-shelishiyah; for even <S%H1571><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nimrim <S%H5249><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> desolate. <S%H4923><s%>

"And I shall make <S%H7673><s%> an end <S%H7673><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "the one who offers <S%H5927><s%> [sacrifice] on the high <S%H1116><s%> place <S%H1116><s%> and the one who burns <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> to his gods. <S%H430><s%>

"Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> wails <S%H1993><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%> like flutes; <S%H2485><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> also wails <S%H1993><s%> like flutes <S%H2485><s%> for the men <S%H376><s%> of Kir-heres. Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they have lost the abundance <S%H6><s%> it produced. <S%H3502><s%>

"For every <S%H3605><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> is bald <S%H7144><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> beard <S%H2206><s%> cut <S%H1639><s%> short; <S%H1639><s%> there are gashes <S%H1417><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> and sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> on the loins. <S%H4975><s%>

"On all <S%H3605><s%> the housetops <S%H1406><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> and in its streets <S%H7339><s%> there <S%H3605><s%> is lamentation <S%H4553><s%> everywhere; <S%H3605><s%> for I have broken <S%H7665><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> like an undesirable <S%H369><s%> <S%H2656><s%> vessel, <S%H3627><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"How <S%H349><s%> shattered <S%H2865><s%> it is! [How <S%H349><s%>] they have wailed! <S%H3213><s%> How Moab <S%H4124><s%> has turned <S%H6437><s%> his back <S%H6203><s%> – he is ashamed! <S%H954><s%> So Moab <S%H4124><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> a laughingstock <S%H7814><s%> and an object <S%H4288><s%> of terror <S%H4288><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> him."

For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> one will fly <S%H1675><s%> swiftly <S%H1675><s%> like an eagle, <S%H5404><s%> And spread <S%H6566><s%> out his wings <S%H3671><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

"Kerioth <S%H7152><s%> has been captured <S%H3920><s%> And the strongholds <S%H4679><s%> have been seized, <S%H8610><s%> So the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> Will be like the heart <S%H3820><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> in labor. <S%H9504><s%>

"And Moab <S%H4124><s%> will be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> from [being] a people <S%H5971><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> he has become <S%H1431><s%> arrogant <S%H1431><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
"Terror, <S%H6343><s%> pit, <S%H6354><s%> and snare <S%H6341><s%> are [coming] upon you, O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"The one who flees <S%H5127><s%> from the terror <S%H6343><s%> Will fall <S%H5307><s%> into the pit, <S%H6354><s%> And the one who climbs <S%H5927><s%> up out of the pit <S%H6354><s%> Will be caught <S%H3920><s%> in the snare; <S%H6341><s%> For I shall bring <S%H935><s%> upon her, [even] upon Moab, <S%H4124><s%> The year <S%H8141><s%> of their punishment, <S%H6486><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"In the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> The fugitives <S%H5127><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> strength; <S%H3581><s%> For a fire <S%H784><s%> has gone <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> And a flame <S%H3852><s%> from the midst <S%H996><s%> of Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> And it has devoured <S%H398><s%> the forehead <S%H6285><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> And the scalps <S%H6936><s%> of the riotous <S%H7588><s%> revelers. <S%H1121><s%> <S%H7588><s%>

"Woe <S%H188><s%> to you, Moab! <S%H4124><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> of Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> have perished; For your sons <S%H6><s%> have been taken <S%H1121><s%> away captive, <S%H3947><s%> And your daughters <S%H7628><s%> into captivity. <S%H1323><s%>

"Yet I will restore <S%H7725><s%> the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> In the latter <S%H319><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> Thus <S%H2008><s%> far <S%H5704><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> on Moab. <S%H4124><s%>
